news.title: News
news.cardTitle: How to Choose the Perfect Gadgets
news.cardDesc: When the valley is filled with mist and the meridian sun hits the hilltop...
news.cardDesc2: Interesting stories about how technologies can transform our lives...
news.cardDesc3: Challenges faced in the process of creating many new discoveries...
news.titleBt: When the beautiful valley is filled with mist around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable leaves of my trees, and a few stray gleams make their way into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the flowing stream; as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants present themselves to my eyes: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who created us in His image, and the breath of that universal love which bears and sustains us — it floats around us in eternal bliss. Then, my friend, when darkness closes in on my eyes, and heaven and earth dwell in my soul like the form of my beloved, I often think longingly: “Oh, could I describe these feelings? As my soul is the mirror of the infinite God, so might everything that lives within me be reflected onto paper, to be the mirror of my soul!”
